name: There's Nothing Wrong With Not Knowing
name_original: There's Nothing Wrong With Not Knowing
description:
The premise of this game is based on the quote "there's nothing wrong with not knowing" spoken by Neil deGrasse Tyson. Frustrated by the lack of answers in their work life, the player sets out to find a coffee shop to take a reluctant break. Since it is a fairly new shop and they don't know the way, the player asks for help from civilians. I added conditional dialogue for the player's coworker based on if there is coffee variable in the player's inventory since it was a request to grab two cups. This game is a cute and quick playthrough to remind yourself to take it easy.

Credits:

Made by me with the Bitsy editor!
